alert.note: Alert for Hooker; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hooker and central McPherson Counties through 700 PM CDT/600 PM MDT/... At 615 PM CDT/515 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles west of Tryon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tryon, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Schnick Lake and Shimmons Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 182 and 211. Highway 97 between mile markers 26 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
